SEARCH
Package it.polimi.softeng.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
General controller with functions of: - managing ChatController and GameController (which also controls the shelfie and the board); - communicating using ServerMessageHandler

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller()

  • Method Details

    • SocketChatRequest

      public boolean SocketChatRequest(String receiver, String message, String sender)
      This method processes chat requests sent by ServerMessageHandler. It also makes some checks on the receiver and sender, then forward to ChatController.
      Parameters:
      receiver - is receiver of chat message
      message - is JSON message encoded
      sender - is the sender of the message

    • SocketGameMoveRequest

      public boolean SocketGameMoveRequest(ArrayList<Cell> positionsToBeRemoved, int column, String requester)
      This method processes move requests sent by ServerMessageHandler, only if the requester is the current player. Then it forwards the move request to GameController.
      Parameters:
      positionsToBeRemoved - is positions to be removed from board
      column - is column of insertion in shelfie
      requester - is requester of game move
      Returns:
      true if move is done by currentPlayerTurn, false if not

    • SocketLoginRequest

      public boolean SocketLoginRequest(String nickname, int gameMode, int numOfPlayer, int startGame)
      This method processes login requests sent from ServerMessageHandlerr. It verifies if the nickname is unique and ensures a reconnection for disconnected players.
      Parameters:
      nickname - is nickname of player
      gameMode - is easy or normal mode
      numOfPlayer - is number of player (2-4)
      startGame - if 1 a new game will be created, if 2 join a lobby
      Returns:
      true if request is successful

    • SocketPlayerScoreRequest

      public boolean SocketPlayerScoreRequest(String requester)
      This method receives Socket PlayerScore Requests from ServerMessageHandler and forwards them to ServerSide
      Parameters:
      requester - is requester
      Returns:
      true if everything went correctly

    • sendErrorMessage

      public void sendErrorMessage(String error, String receiver)
      Used to send error messages to client
      Parameters:
      error - contains error type
      receiver - is error receiver

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      This method manage the requests of start of a game sent by LoginManagerV2 invoking the corresponding method of GameController

      public ServerSide getServerSide()
